alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 25 at 8:24PM CDT until April 25 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 166 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN OKLAHOMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN THE OKLAHOMA PANHANDLE... TEXAS IN TEXAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 15 COUNTIES IN THE TEXAS PANHANDLE... ARMSTRONG CARSON COLLINGSWORTH DONLEY GRAY HANSFORD HEMPHILL HUTCHINSON MOORE OCHILTREE POTTER RANDALL ROBERTS SHERMAN WHEELER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMARILLO, BORGER, BRISCOE, BUFFALO LAKE, BUSHLAND, CANADIAN, CANYON, CLARENDON, CLAUDE, CODMAN, DOZIER, DUMAS, FARNSWORTH, FOUR WAY, GLAZIER, GOODNIGHT, GRUVER, GUYMON, KINGSMILL, LAKE MARVIN, LELA, LORA, LUTIE, MASTERSON, MIAMI, PAMPA, PANHANDLE, PANTEX, PERRYTON, SAMNORWOOD, SHAMROCK, SKELLYTOWN, SPEARMAN, STRATFORD, TWITTY, UMBARGER, WAKA, WASHBURN, WAYSIDE, WELLINGTON, WHEELER, WHITE DEER, AND WOLF CREEK PARK.
